tool_description: The "AnimeList API" is a powerful service that provides access to a comprehensive collection of top anime titles, each accompanied by detailed information such as title, description, trailer, and top characters.  Developers can utilize this API to retrieve data about popular anime series, movies, or OVAs (original video animations) by making HTTP requests to the appropriate endpoints.
